document_data.name: ''Potion of Mind Reading''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''potion of mind reading''''' was a [[potion]] that temporarily empowered its drinker with the power to read minds.
document_data.Description: A typical ''potion of mind reading'' was a dense, purple liquid. Floating within the liquid, an ovoid pink cloud could be seen.
document_data.Powers: The potion gave its drinker the effects of the ''[[detect thoughts]]'' [[spell]].
document_data.Creation: One of the recipes of ''potions of mind reading'' required a potion of an [[alchemical]] suspension of [[mergrass]] mixed with certain alchemical sublimates.
document_data.Notable Users: *Sister [[Anna Lidwin]], a sentient [[undead]] merchant, active in the [[Reithwin Town]] of the [[Shadow-Cursed Lands]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
